Pellegrino has dedicated a significant amount of his time analyzing the virtue of justice in medicine, aware that it's misinterpretation could drive to an important load of suffering in vulnerable population, such as elderly or poor patients. The author also studies the impact of social changes as well as science and technology development in doctor-patient relationship, spinal cord of every justice-based health system.
